channel.title: Stop a character file saving? need the void?
channel.description:
Hello.
What is the int to stop a file saving to the moreinfo folder? for a reason that I need. Here is an example:
[code]savefile = false;[/code]
For me that only misses out the character file not the moreinfo one.
Does anyone no it.
Many Thanks.
